title: Problems with Low Frame Rate
body:
I seem to be having a lot of frame rate issues lately. before i was averaging about 310 but about 2 days ago i average about 70, and can drop to 45 during team fights. even when i'm on the lowest settings with no background applications open, this still occurs.

AMD FX(tm)-6100 Six-Core Processor
16.0GB of Ram
64-bit Operating System, x64-based processor.
NVIDIA GTX 1070/REV 1.0 (PCI-E 3.0/8192MB GDDR5/256 BIT)

is there any reason i should be experiencing these frame rate drops?

replies.body: With that big of a difference in your FPS before and after, there might be something going on with your graphics card or you might have missed a driver update somewhere along the way. Check out the steps in this [**FPS guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) for some fixes, but definitely reach back out to me if that doesn't seem to help.
